pullRequest.title: Warn of mismatch between jdmpview and producer of core file
pullRequest.bodyText: Compare system property "java.vm.name" from core file and from host VM; warn about possible compatibility problems when they aren't the same.

nodes.bodyText: I'm thinking it could be useful to print the warning even if one of the names is null.

commit.message:
Warn of mismatch between jdmpview and producer of core file

Compare system property "java.vm.name" from core file and host VM;
warn about compatibility problems when they aren't the same.

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>
